name: Three Wing Aviation Group, LLC
about: Three Wing Aviation Group, LLC, established in 1974, is a premier aviation service provider located at Bridgeport/Sikorsky Airport in Connecticut. Our flight school offers comprehensive training from discovery flights to advanced pilot certifications, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Commercial Rating, all conducted by FAA-certified instructors on a one-to-one basis. As a Part 61 Flight School, we cater to individual schedules and provide a positive learning environment. In addition to flight instruction, we operate a full-service FBO, aircraft maintenance facility, and offer various amenities such as fuel services, hangar availability, and gourmet catering coordination. Known for our dedicated professional staff and excellent customer service, Three Wing Aviation is committed to providing the highest quality aviation services. Join us to achieve your flying goals in a supportive and professional setting.
